form.label: CIP-007 R1: Ports and Services
form.description: This standard addresses system security by specifying technical, operational, and procedural requirements in support of protecting High and Medium Impact BES Cyber Systems against compromise that could lead to misoperation or instability of the Bulk Electric System.

search.query: `get_removable_media_indexes` | lookup cip_asset_lookup.csv nt_host as ComputerName OUTPUTNEW site_id as dest_site_id,zone as dest_zone, classification | fillnull dest_zone value="esp:unknown" | fillnull classification value="cip:unknown" | fillnull dest_site_id value="unknown" | search classification="*cip:*" $espZone_tok$ $esp_facility_tok$ | mvexpand dest_zone | eval dest_zone=lower(dest_zone) | `get_esp_zone(dest_zone)` | stats count by dest_zone | sort -count

`get_removable_media_indexes` | lookup cip_asset_lookup.csv nt_host as ComputerName OUTPUTNEW site_id as dest_site_id,zone as dest_zone, classification, category | fillnull dest_zone value="esp:unknown" | fillnull classification value="cip:unknown" | fillnull dest_site_id value="unknown" | search classification="*cip:*" $espZone_tok$ $esp_facility_tok$ | `get_esp_zone(dest_zone)` | stats count by ComputerName | sort -count | head 10

| inputlookup cip_network_configs.csv | eval ip=host | `get_cip_info_by_ip(host, "dest")` | search $espZone_tok$ $esp_facility_tok$ | `get_esp_zone(dest_zone)` | table dest_nt_host,dest_zone,dest_site_id,port_id,port_enabled,is_duplex,speed | rename dest_nt_host as Host, dest_zone as "ESP Host", port_id as "Port ID", port_enabled as Enabled, is_duplex as "Is Duplex",speed as Bandwidth, dest_site_id as Facility

| tstats summariesonly=true min(_time) as "firstTime",max(_time) as "lastTime" from datamodel="Network_Traffic"."All_Traffic" where "All_Traffic.action"="allowed" by "All_Traffic.transport","All_Traffic.dest_port","All_Traffic.dest" | `drop_dm_object_name("All_Traffic")` | lookup local=true application_protocol_lookup transport,dest_port OUTPUTNEW app | fillnull value=unknown app | `get_cip_info_by_ip(dest, "dest")` | search dest_classification="*cip*" $espZone_tok$ $esp_facility_tok$ | `dayDiff(firstTime)` | search dayDiff<7 | table firstTime,lastTime,transport,dest_port,app | convert ctime(firstTime), ctime(lastTime) | rename firstTime as "First Occurance", lastTime as "Last Occurance", transport as Transport, dest_port as "Dest Port", app as App

`get_removable_media_indexes` | lookup cip_asset_lookup.csv nt_host as ComputerName OUTPUTNEW site_id as dest_site_id,zone as dest_zone, classification, category | lookup cip_asset_lookup.csv nt_host as Model OUTPUTNEW category as device_category | fillnull dest_zone value="esp:unknown" | fillnull classification value="cip:unknown" | fillnull dest_site_id value="unknown" | mvexpand dest_zone | search classification="*cip:*" $espZone_tok$ $esp_facility_tok$
| fillnull device_category value="No" | eval is_tca=CASE( match(device_category, ".*TCA.*"), "Yes", 1=1, "No") | `get_esp_zone(dest_zone)`
| table _time,ComputerName,dest_zone,dest_site_id,UserName,Model,is_tca | rename ComputerName as Host, ComputerIPAddress as IP, UserName as User, is_tca as "Is TCA", dest_zone as "Zone", dest_site_id as Facility | sort -_time
